remarks: Conjoin antecedents and consequents in a deduction.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2007.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 19-Jul-2013.)
statement:
anim12ii.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
anim12ii.2 $e |- ( th -> ( ps -> ta ) ) $.
anim12ii $p |- ( ( ph /\ th ) -> ( ps -> ( ch /\ ta ) ) ) $.
